nodes.text: Rogue Alpha was the callsign used by pilots who were temporarily added to Rogue Squadron when the squadron was already full.

Nrin Vakil held the position when he flew a T-65R X-wing reconnaissance starfighter with the Rogues in the campaign against Delak Krennel. Wedge Antilles when he was piloting a T-65BR X-wing reconnaissance starfighter at Garqi when a commando team was put on to the planet to monitor the activities of the Yuuzhan Vong.
